p: A common garden pot experiment was conducted in Dengshuiling village, in the southeast of Dongguan City (113°31′‐114°15′E; 22°39′‐23°09′N), Guangdong Province, China. The province has a subtropical climate with a mean annual precipitation of 1,819.9 mm, temperature of 23.1°C, and sunshine time of 1,873.7 hr. Mikania first invaded the province in early 1990s where it spread extensively in the shrublands and abandoned agricultural fields.
